<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_648911_starbucks_handcrafted_espresso</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Automatically Update Catalog Item HE</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	gs.addErrorMessage(current.image);
	var cat_1=new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
	cat_1.addQuery('name',current.drink_s_name);
	cat_1.query();
	cat_1.short_description=current.short_description;
	cat_1.picture=current.image;
	cat_1.update();
    
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-04 14:07:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9f8d98212f60b010bd8e93acf699b644</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Automatically Update Catalog Item HE</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Starbucks at Your Service(SYS)" source="x_648911_starbucks">16d231a32f50b010bd8e93acf699b651</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Starbucks at Your Service(SYS)">16d231a32f50b010bd8e93acf699b651</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9f8d98212f60b010bd8e93acf699b644</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-04 18:12:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9f8d98212f60b010bd8e93acf699b644"/></record_update>
